title: [Veiled Stream, Valley View]
description: Flowing with a quiet murmur, a small stream breaks free of a nearby pool, casually cascading over ground that quickly drops into a steeped valley.  From this vantage point, the valley's lush growth is visible in the moonlight, its wealth in life obvious not only in the spread of trees, but also in the sheer volume of squawking, buzzing, grunting, and rustling that fills the night air and echoes up the valley.
room.location: the environs of the Saewehna Lagoon
